overview:
## Return Value

The shared `HKQuantityType` instance based on the provided identifier.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses quantity types to create samples that store a numerical value. Use quantity type instances to create quantity samples that you can save in the HealthKit store. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample].

# quantityType(forIdentifier:)

**Type Method**

Returns the shared quantity type for the provided identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
class func quantityType(forIdentifier identifier: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier) -> HKQuantityType?
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: A quantity type identifier. For a list of valid identifiers, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityTypeIdentifier].

## Return Value

The shared `HKQuantityType` instance based on the provided identifier.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses quantity types to create samples that store a numerical value. Use quantity type instances to create quantity samples that you can save in the HealthKit store. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample].

## Creating quantity types

- **HKQuantityTypeIdentifier**: The identifiers that create quantity type objects.
